work.title: Anica Inc.
work.description: Built a property management website that allows landlords and real estate professionals to track leases, residents, and maintenance tasks as well as collect rent and manage finances to reduce costs and streamline operations.

work.title: Well Connect MDs
work.description: Developed an Android application that improves the efficiency of conducting chronic care management services. The application allows doctors to capture patient information, schedule appointments, and automate billing.
